articles.title: AFL members offered multiple options for 2020 - The Age
articles.description: While club members are still waiting, AFL members have been encouraged to choose one of four options that "best suit" their situation in 2020.
articles.content: Those who choose to become an absentee member will be refunded but will not receive a 30 per cent discount on next year's membership or a members' pack. However, they will be required to pay a $170 fee for adults, which would allow them to attend matches in 2… [+2697 chars]

articles.title: International Cricket Council recommends rule change banning use of saliva to shine balls post-coronavirus - ABC News
articles.description: Watch out, bowlers, cricket's governing body is recommending a rule change to stop the use of saliva to shine balls when the game returns — but sweat will be allowed.
articles.content:
The age-old trick of using saliva to shine a cricket ball could be a thing of the past when the sport resumes, with the International Cricket Council (ICC) recommending a change to the laws in the wake of the novel coronavirus.
